comment.text: SelectDeliveryTime is used as a button title to prompt users to select their preferred delivery time when viewing portal settings. This key appears in a "Add Button" component within a FilterDialog sub-component.

usage.context:
<TimePickerCell>
 <SelectorAddButton
 title={t("Common:AddButton")}
 onClick={showTimePicker}
 className="mr-8 add-delivery-time-button"
 label={t("SelectDeliveryTime")}
 />
 </TimePickerCell>
 )
 ) : null}
 </Selectors>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Seleccione plazo de entrega' is understandable, it's not the most natural or idiomatic translation of 'Select Delivery time.' 'Plazo de entrega' implies a timeframe rather than the act of selection.
While technically correct, 'Seleziona Tempo di consegna' is a very literal translation. A more natural phrasing in Italian would be 'Scegli orario di consegna' or 'Imposta orario di consegna'.

The translation '配信時間の選択' while technically correct, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Select Delivery time'. It's a bit formal. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like '配達時間を選ぶ' (Haitatsu jikan o erabu).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 配達時間を選ぶ (Haitatsu jikan o erabu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "전송 시간 선택" literally translates to 'Select Sending time'. The English content refers to 'Delivery time,' which needs to be accurately conveyed.

The translation 'Selectare Timp de livrare' is a literal translation but not the most natural phrasing in Romanian. 'Selectare' is somewhat formal and 'Timp de livrare' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of selecting a delivery time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'Alegere ora de livrare' or 'Selectați ora de livrare'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Select Delivery time" refers to choosing a delivery time slot. The Russian translation "Выбрать время отправки" translates to "Select sending time," which is not the same. "Отправки" refers to sending, not delivery.
The Serbian translation 'Одабери време доставе' is not a fully accurate translation of 'Select Delivery time'. It lacks the word 'time' in the Serbian sentence, implying 'Choose delivery'.

The translation 'Виберіть час доставлення' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Select Delivery time'. 'Доставлення' is a more formal term. A more common and fluent option would be 'Виберіть час доставки'.

The Vietnamese translation "Chọn thời gian Gửi" translates to "Select Delivery Send" which is not accurate. It should translate to "Select Delivery Time" or something similar indicating the time for delivery.

The translation "选择传递时间" (xuǎnzé chuándì shíjiān) is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Select Delivery time".  '传递' (chuándì) implies a transfer of goods, not the act of selecting a delivery time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 选择送货时间 (xuǎnzé sònghuò shíjiān) - This translates to "Select Delivery time" and is a more common and natural phrasing.
